semantic_identifier: [GOLD-9]: Add setup-time data quality checks and normalization for Fit Driver inputs
title: Add setup-time data quality checks and normalization for Fit Driver inputs

sections.text: Implement validation and normalization for connected data sources during setup to reduce noisy inputs to fit scoring (e.g., missing required fields, inconsistent enums, empty strings, obvious outliers). Surface a compact “Data Quality” panel with actionable issues and suggested fixes (auto-trim/normalize casing, map common synonyms, flag low-fill-rate fields) before users finalize fit driver configuration. Persist normalization rules per workspace so subsequent ingests stay consistent without additional user effort.
